skills.name: Frenzy
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Generate Fury:</text> <text class='c_resource'>4</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>30%</text></br>Unleash a rapid flurry of blows, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.11 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*2</text> damage with each pair of hits. </br></br>If <text class='c_important'>Frenzy</text> hits an enemy, its Attack Speed is increased by <text class='c_number'>20%</text> for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds, up to <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * [3 + [Round(Affix_Value_1#Amulet_Unique_Barb_100)]] * 100]%</text>.

skills.name: Hammer of the Ancients
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Fury Cost:</text> <text class='c_resource'>35</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>50%</text></br>Slam your hammer down with the fury of the Ancients, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.5 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage to a concentrated area.

skills.name: Rallying Cry
skills.desc: ifMod.UpgradeA<text class='c_label'>Generate Fury:</text> <text class='c_resource'>20</text></br><text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>25</text> seconds</br>Bellow a rallying cry, increasing your Movement Speed by <text class='c_number'>[[0.3 * (1+[ParagonNodeIsPurchased(SNO.ParagonNode.Barbarian_Legendary_005) ? 0.35 : 0])]*100]%</text> and Resource Generation by <text class='c_number'>[[(0.4 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))) * (1+[ParagonNodeIsPurchased(SNO.ParagonNode.Barbarian_Legendary_005) ? 0.35 : 0])] * 100]%</text> for <text class='c_number'>[[6 * (1 + 0.08*sLevel)]|1|]</text> seconds, and Nearby allies for <text class='c_number'>[[[6 * (1 + 0.08*sLevel)] * .5]|1|]</text> seconds.

skills.name: Wrath of the Berserker
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>60</text> seconds</br>Explode into rage, Knocking Back surrounding enemies and gaining <text class='c_important'><u>Berserking</u></text> and <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text> for <text class='c_number'>603</text> seconds.  For the next <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds, dealing direct damage with <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grants <text class='c_important'><u>Berserking</u></text> for <text class='c_number'>602</text> seconds.

(0 ? 0 : 1) : 0]<text class='c_label'>Charges:</text> <text class='c_resource'>2</text></br><text class='c_label'>Charge Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_barb_004) ? (0 ? 0 : 1) : 0] ? 15 : 0</text> seconds</br>if[AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_barb_004) ? 0 : (0 ? 0 : 1)]<text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_barb_004) ? 0 : (0 ? 0 : 1)] ? 15 : 0.25</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>50%</text></br>Attempt a killing strike, dealing <text class='c_number'>[1.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))] + (0 ? 0 : 0)</text> damage to enemies in front of you.</br></br>if[AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_barb_004) ? 0 : (0 ? 0 : 1)]If this kills an enemy, its Cooldown is reset.if[AffixIsEquipped(SNO.Affix.legendary_barb_004) ? (0 ? 0 : 1) : 0]If this kills an enemy, a Charge is refunded.

skills.name: Leap
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>[17 * ((cdr[sLevel])]</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>66%</text></br>Leap forward and then slam down, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.33 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and Knocking Back surrounding enemies on impact.
